title: I got Forum Banned?
body:
For calling riot pathetic because they can't give me 1 god damn fair game?

Are you fuckign kidding me? Are you seriously fucking kidding me? Why do I have to play every game with a feeder, an afk, and a troll with 5k ping? HOW IS THAT FUCKING FAIR WHEN I SPEND MONEY TO HELP THIS PIECE OF SHIT GREEDY AS FUCK COMPANY?
